references.paper_title: Perseus: A simple and optimal high-order method for variational inequalities
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel second-order algorithm for variational inequalities that achieves optimal convergence rates and serves as a foundational basis for the current research.

references.paper_title: Optimal methods for higher-order smooth monotone variational inequalities
references.reason: This paper establishes lower bounds and proposes optimal algorithms for higher-order smooth monotone variational inequalities, providing a theoretical benchmark for the current work.

references.paper_title: Higher-order methods for convex-concave min-max optimization and monotone variational inequalities
references.reason: This paper explores high-order methods for min-max optimization and variational inequalities, providing a comprehensive review of existing methods and laying the groundwork for advanced approaches.

references.paper_title: Prox-method with rate of convergence o(1/t) for variational inequalities with Lipschitz continuous monotone operators and smooth convex-concave saddle point problems
references.reason: This seminal paper introduces the prox-method with an optimal convergence rate for variational inequalities, which has significantly influenced the field and is directly relevant to the current study.

references.paper_title: The extragradient method for finding saddle points and other problems
references.reason: This foundational paper introduces the extragradient method, a key algorithm in variational inequality solving, whose convergence properties and limitations are analyzed in this paper.
